mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BBS ( PST_TTL, PST_CN, PBLR_NM, PST_PSWD, REG_DT, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{pstTtl}, #{pstCn}, #{pblrNm}, #{pstPswd}, GETDATE(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT PST_SN AS pstSn, PST_TTL AS pstTtl, PST_CN AS pstCn, PBLR_NM AS pblrNm, REG_DT AS regDt FROM TBL_BBS WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PST_SN DESC
SELECT PST_SN AS pstSn, PST_TTL AS pstTtl, PST_CN AS pstCn, PBLR_NM AS pblrNm, PST_PSWD AS pstPswd, REG_DT AS regDt FROM TBL_BBS WHERE PST_SN = #{pstSn} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BBS SET PST_TTL = #{pstTtl}, PST_CN = #{pstCn}, MDFCN_DT = GETDATE() WHERE PST_SN = #{pstSn}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TBL_BBS SET MDFCN_DT = GETDATE(), DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE PST_SN = #{pstSn}
